CustomField.description: This field is used to determine whether an opportunity is open for the purposes of populating the Share Open Opp? field on Relationships
CustomField.formula: OR( ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Lost'), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Verbally Engaged'), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Dead'), ISPICKVAL(Stage__c, 'Engaged') )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used to determine whether an opportunity is open for the purposes of populating the Share Open Opp? field on Relationships
CustomField.label: Closed
